name: Council of Elrond
summary: A council held in Rivendell to decide the fate of the One Ring.

name: Bilbo Finds the Ring
summary: Bilbo Baggins discovers the One Ring in Gollum's cave beneath the Misty Mountains.

name: Battle of the Five Armies
summary: A major battle near the Lonely Mountain involving dwarves, elves, men, goblins, and wargs.

name: Destruction of the One Ring
summary: The One Ring is destroyed in the fires of Mount Doom, ending Sauron's power.

name: Battle of Helm's Deep
summary: A decisive battle where Rohan defended Helm's Deep against Saruman's forces.

name: Battle of the Pelennor Fields
summary: A great battle for Minas Tirith where the forces of Gondor and Rohan defeated Sauron's army.

name: Frodo Arrives at Rivendell
summary: Frodo Baggins arrives at Rivendell after fleeing the Nazgul.

name: Gandalf Fights the Balrog
summary: Gandalf confronts and defeats the Balrog of Moria, sacrificing himself in the process.
